article.headline: Illinois St. 68, Creighton 54
article.story: NORMAL, Ill. (AP) -- Anthony Slack scored 15 points and had a career-high 20 rebounds to lead Illinois State to a 68-54 win over Creighton on Wednesday night. Osiris Eldridge added 15 points and Levi Dyer and Boo Richardson had 13 points apiece for Illinois State (21-8, 12-5 Missouri Valley), which was tied with Creighton 31-31 at halftime. The Redbirds pulled away after the break on 46 percent shooting, compared with 32 percent for Creighton (19-9, 9-8). Illinois State also controlled the boards, outrebounding Creighton 45-24 and outscoring the Bluejays 27-9 on second-chance points. Slack's tally was the first 20-rebound game for Illinois State since 1978. Booker Woodfox led Creighton with 12 points. Dane Watts added 10 points for the Bluejays. Illinois State swept the regular-season series with Creighton for the first time since 1997-1998. The Redbirds beat the Bluejays 80-67 in December.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
